entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
